summary: The body of a young woman is found in a small and quiet town in North Italy. A detective from the nearby main city is called to solve the mystery.
cast: Toni Servillo|Denis Fasolo|Nello Mascia|Giulia Michelini|Marco Baliani|Fausto Maria Sciarappa|Franco Ravera|Sara D'Amario|Heidi Caldart|Alessia Piovan|Nicole Perrone|Anna Bonaiuto|Omero Antonutti|Fabrizio Gifuni|Valeria Golino|Augusto Balliana|Enrico Cavallero|Sandra Cosatto|Daniele Griggio|Maria Sole Mansutti|Marzia Postogna|Giuliano Zannier
title: No mires atrás
